entities: United Nations Verification Mission in Colombia
summary:
The Security Council, reaffirming its commitment to Colombia's peace process, recalls its previous resolutions and statements. It welcomes progress made towards peace and urges parties to sustain progress through comprehensive implementation of the Final Agreement. Recalling resolution 2366 (2017), it established the UN Verification Mission in Colombia to verify implementation of the Final Agreement by the Government and FARC-EP. 
1. Decides to extend the Verification Mission's mandate to 25 September 2020, with reporting requirements as per resolutions 2366 (2017), 2377 (2017), and 2435 (2018).
2. Expresses willingness to further extend the mandate based on agreement between parties.
